title: Science Museum-Integrated Language Learning: Contextual Interest-Eliciting Project

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science concepts and online learning platform experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining virtual science museum tours with language learning

learning_goals: Learners can accurately use specialized terminology in their field at 80% or higher by utilizing science museum exhibition content.
Learners maintain 70% or higher participation in learning based on autonomy and a sense of achievement through situational language tasks.
Learners improve their explanatory writing skills on scientific topics through online collaborative activities with peers.

resources: Access to Virtual Science Museum Platform

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
